price: Dan di antara manusia ada orang yang mengorbankan dirinya karena mencari keridaan Allah; dan Allah Maha Penyantun kepada hamba-hamba-Nya.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَشۡرِي نَفۡسَهُ ٱبۡتِغَآءَ مَرۡضَاتِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَٱللَّهُ رَءُوفُۢ بِٱلۡعِبَادِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamina al-nāsi man yashrī nafsahu ib'tighāa marḍāti al-lahi wal-lahu raūfun bil-ʿibādi
